title: Schiff: ‘We can’t rely’ on the numbers coming out of China

title: What to expect when you’re expecting during a pandemic

author: MPX
title: How the WH mishandled first 70 days of coronavirus crisis
description: The Morning Joe panel discusses the timeline of when the Trump WH first learned of the coronavirus in China and how the president handled the first 70 days of the crisis.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Government watchdog: Hospitals face severe shortages of medical gear
description: U.S. hospitals face dire shortages of medical equipment amid the coronavirus outbreak and fear they can't ensure the safety of health care workers needed to treat patients with COVID-19, according to an internal government watchdog report.

author: MPX
title: Trump again touts unproven drug to treat coronavirus
description: The president on Sunday used his daily press briefing on Sunday to again endorse unproven drugs to battle the coronavirus. Meanwhile, Surgeon General Jerome Adams said this week would be the country's 'Pearl Harbor' moment.

title: Sen. King: Trump was wrong to remove Atkinson

title: WaPo reporter: So much of the timeline was squandered

title: On multiple fronts, Trump clashes with public-health experts

content: At face value, the White House's press briefing on Friday was an important milestone: it was the event at which the administration announced new guidelines, encouraging Americans to wear masks in public in order to help prevent the spread of the coronavirus.… [+3869 chars]

author: MSNBC.com
title: How the Queen said more than Trump in a few short minutes

title: Touting untested medicinal treatment, Trump adds, 'What do I know?'

content: Donald Trump and his team have been surprisingly aggressive in talking up some anti-malaria drugs -- most notably hydroxychloroquine -- despite the fact that the medications haven't been approved for treating COVID-19, the evidence on its efficacy is anecdota… [+3331 chars]
